snippet: A federal appeals court ruled that ex-Goldman employee Sergey Aleynikov did not violate corporate espionage laws by downloading computer code from his former employer.
abstract: A federal appeals court ruled that ex-Goldman employee Sergey Aleynikov did not violate corporate espionage laws by downloading computer code from his former employer.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and PETER LATTMAN

headline.main: Appeals Court Limits Law Used in Goldman Programmer Case
headline.print_headline: Appeals Court Limits Federal Law Used in Goldman Programmer Case
